DOC.detailed_description: A total least 150 patient include follow least one year . The proliferative speed culture cell classify ( ) rapid proliferation HCC cell without concomitant rapid proliferation cancer-associated fibroblast ( CAFs ) , ( b ) rapid proliferation CAFs alone , ( c ) slow proliferation three group . The definition rapid proliferation culture cell fit least one follow two item : ( 1 ) growth area culture cell 15th-28th day > two time growth area measure 14th day , ( 2 ) growth area culture cell 15th-28th day > 70 % growth area 25 cm flask . The GraphPad Prism software version 4.03 ( GraphPad Software , Inc. , La Jolla , CA , USA ) apply statistical analysis . Influence proliferative speed culture cell survival cancer progression calculate logrank test . The statistical significance define P < 0.05 .
